tool_description: Creating, signing and managing a contract becomes as simple as sending an email.
name: Contract Live
title: Contract Live

api_list.name: Get Template Content
api_list.description: Retrieve the content of a template
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contractlive.p.rapidapi.com/template/template_MxatcZ/content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contractlive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://contractlive.p.rapidapi.com/template/{uid}/content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contractlive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get negotiation activities
api_list.description: Return all activities of a negotiation

api_list.name: Get Negotiation Attachment
api_list.description: Get information about a negotiation attachment (except the file itself)

api_list.name: Get Negotiation Content
api_list.description: Retrieve negotiation content (last version) in HTML or PDF format.
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contractlive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Get Negotiation Attachment Content
api_list.description: Return the file contained in a negotiation attachment

api_list.name: Get a Negotiaiton Signed PDF
api_list.description: When a negotiation is signed, the result is a signed PDF
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contractlive.p.rapidapi.com/negotiation/negotiation_ar39He/signedPDF"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contractlive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Environment
